Show settings
This shows all impacts with an impact level higher then the value you specified in the TypoScribt object Impact.db_threshold.
You can find all impacts in the logfile you specified in TypoScribt object Logging.path.
In the pi1/class.tx_pxphpids_pi1.php set debug to true and check if you can get any impacts.
This will set all DB entries in the tx_pxphpids_log table to deleted=1 and no longer show them in "Show all impacts". Are you sure you want to do that?
Successfully set all entrys in the tx_pxphpids_log table to deleted=1.
This will truncate the tx_pxphpids_cache table and delete all of its records. Are you sure you want to do that?
Successfully truncated tx_pxphpids_cache.
This are the current PHPIDS settings. You can modify them with your Typo-Script Object Browser.
